m_szDocSumamry: Finance & Internal Relations Want to get involved? Check out our committees to the left! If you have any questions feel free to email us. Executive Team The exec team consists of the directors of all the committees of TechX. We care deeply about all the events and initiatives that we have to offer, and we strive to make our mission of empowering students through technology possible on campus. Directors: Andreea Martin HackMIT HackMIT organizes MIT's largest annual undergraduate hackathon.
